name: Chicken Gumbo
recipeIngredient: 16 oz frozen gumbo style vegetables, okra, pepper and onion
29 oz canned diced tomatoes, with mild chilies
3 Cups roasted skinless chicken breast, cubed

recipeInstructions.text: Coat a large skillet with nonstick cooking spray. Add vegetables and saute over high heat, stirring frequently, for 2 minutes. Stir in flour and cook 1 minute more.
Stir in tomatoes, chicken and Creole seasoning. Cook over medium heat, stirring frequently, until hot, about 6 minutes. Yields about 1 1/2 cups per serving.
For a soupier consistency, add a small amount of water or broth to the recipe.
